snippet.title: HyperDot | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Dodge everything.

Available on:
Steam: http://bit.ly/2NjDRfN
itch.io: http://bit.ly/39Nm6z2
Xbox/Windows 10: http://bit.ly/2QTBMrR

HyperDot is a minimalist action arcade game with one rule: dodge everything. Evade enemies and test your skills in over 100 trials in the campaign mode, outlast your friends in multiplayer battles, or build custom challenges with the level editor.

======================



Check out our channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/TribeGames

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/TribeGames

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TribeGames

Visit our Website: http://tribegames.wordpress.com/
